dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3245654O] DMCA Notice
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, February 26, 2007 11:44 AM To: Copyright Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3245654O] DMCA Notice ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. DMCA Notice Added by system at Monday, Feb 26 2007 05:42 pm X-MailFrom: mitch.ellner@miratunes.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Mon Feb 26 17:42:11 2007 Received: (qmail 3411 invoked by alias); 26 Feb 2007 23:42:11 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 3408 invoked from network); 26 Feb 2007 23:42:10 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) (172.16.220.10) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 26 Feb 2007 23:42:10 -0000 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 26 Feb 2007 17:42:08 -0600 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Mon, 26 Feb 2007 17:42:08 -0600 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1172533323-11219-965-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from webmail (rrcs-67-52-191-6.west.biz.rr.com [67.52.191.6]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id 7962862C40 for ; Mon, 26 Feb 2007 17:42:08 -0600 (CST) Received: (qmail 30469 invoked by uid 89); 26 Feb 2007 15:49:14 -0000 Received: by simscan 1.2.0 ppid: 30455, pid: 30464, t: 0.4794s scanners: attach: 1.2.0 clamav: 0.88.4/m:40/d:2020 Received: from unknown (HELO mitchdell700m) (mitchellner@miratunes.com@24.176.212.117) by webmail with ESMTPA; 26 Feb 2007 15:49:14 -0000 Return-Receipt-To: "Mitch Ellner" From: "Mitch Ellner" To: X-ASG-Orig-Subj: DMCA Notice Subject: DMCA Notice Date: Mon, 26 Feb 2007 15:41:45 -0800 Message-ID: MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_00BB_01C759BC.A295D2C0" X-Priority: 1 (Highest) X-MSMail-Priority: High X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook 11 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 Thread-Index: AcdZ/Naq0NWI8z1sQam2JikRbGLiaA== Importance: High Disposition-Notification-To: "Mitch Ellner" X-Antivirus: avast! (VPS 000717-1, 02/26/2007), Outbound message X-Antivirus-Status: Clean X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: mitch.ellner@miratunes.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 26 Feb 2007 23:42:08.0902 (UTC) FILETIME=[BACF2A60:01C759FF] (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) On February 20, 2007, we noticed that your site http://www.vietcyber.com has the following URLS listed that infringes on my exclusive right: http://www.vietcyber.com These URLS include an unattributed copy that infringes on my exclusive right. Miratunes has the exclusive right to electronically distribute the Thuy Nga, Paris by Night 86 Talent Show. According to my records, we have not authorized this use, and I have not authorized any use of any product and/or service related to, hosted by or distributed by Miratunes, Inc. or on behalf of our client Thuy Nga Productions. Pursuant to the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, this letter serves as actualnotice of infringement in the event of legal proceedings (Seven years in prison& 0,000 fine). The information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, we state that we the owner of an exclusive right infringed by the specified material. Pursuant to 17 U.S.C... §§ 512(c) (1) (C) and 512(g),a telephone or other oral response is not satisfactory. Sincerely, Mitch Ellner Acting COO Miratunes, Inc. 949.307.3440 Mobile www.miratunes.com MIME element (text/html)

On February 20, 2007, we noticed that your site http://www.vietcyber.com has the following URLS listed that infringes on my exclusive right:

http://www.vietcyber.com

These URLS include an unattributed copy that infringes on my exclusive right.
